channel.title: Comments on: Import directory of XML files into SQL Server 2005

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: Thanks Denis. I wrote a complete T-SQL one also but I'm sure yours will teach mine a few things and I'm looking forward to it :)

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: I will do the T-SQL version of this, you can do this without the CLR (if it is not enabled) The finding all the files and importing them part
item.content:encoded: I will do the T-SQL version of this, you can do this without the CLR (if it is not enabled) The finding all the files and importing them part
